sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; export default function CreateJobForm() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { title: '', description: '', min_salary: '', max_salary: '', company_name: '', job_location: '', last_date_to_submit: '', contact_email: '', contact_num: '', starting_date: '', technologies: [] }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log(values); } }); return (
